abstract: Mark Zuckerberg denounced remarks by Mr. Andreessen on Twitter that Indians were being shortsighted by banning Facebook’s Free Basics project.
snippet: Mark Zuckerberg denounced remarks by Mr. Andreessen on Twitter that Indians were being shortsighted by banning Facebook’s Free Basics project.
lead_paragraph: Marc Andreessen, a Silicon Valley venture capitalist and board member of the social network Facebook, has long been one of its vocal supporters. On Wednesday, Facebook did not welcome that support.

headline.main: Marc Andreessen Apologizes After Facebook Disavows India Comments
headline.print_headline: Facebook Disavows Andreessen’s Comments on India
